meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a lira in Italy.
meanings.sent1: In Italy, you can buy small candies with just a few centesimi.
meanings.sent2: I found a centesimi coin on the street while walking in Rome.
meanings.sent3: The centesimi rolled away like a tiny wheel down the slope.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like centesimi falling into a jar.
meanings.sent5: The centesimi sparkled in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: A coin worth one hundredth of a lira in Italy.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother collects old centesimi coins as a hobby.
meanings.sent2: I used a centesimi to make a wish in the fountain.
meanings.sent3: The centesimi coin danced on the table, spinning in circles.
meanings.sent4: His words were like centesimi, valuable yet easily spent.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the centesimi dropping echoed in the empty room.
